main.name: Matteo Zancanella
main.description: I love learning, a day without learning something new is a wasted day. I recently quit my job at Haven Life in New York City where we lead the InsureTech industry to be closer to my family in Europe. I have been using Angular, Node, Typescript, and Javascript
main.bio: Hi there, thank you for looking at this site. I studied and worked in the US for 11 years, now I relocated to Europe to my new adventure. Outside work I love spending time with friends and family, playing any sports, tennis, ping ping, Crossfit, and right now I am learning rock climbing and sailing. May our paths cross in the future. Cheers!
main.contactmessage: I just moved back to Europe to be close to family, and I am currently living in Helsinki. Send me an email you wanna work with me!

resume.skillmessage: You can learn a new language in two weeks. Software principles takes many years to master

education.description: Master in Computer Science. Used R for data visualization and Python for machine learning projects
Awesome time learning all about data structures and algo where we built a BattleSnake 3D game with Unity, and had two interships with two S&P500 Companies
